Package org.drip.service.env

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BondManager
    This class implements a container that holds the EOD and bond static information on a per issuer basis.
    CDSManager
    Container that holds the EOD and CDS/credit curve information on a per-issuer basis.
    EnvManager
    EnvManager sets the environment/connection parameters, and populates the market parameters for the given EOD
    EODCurves
    Container that exposes the functionality to create the set of closing IR and credit curves for a given EOD.
    RatesManager
    Manages the creation/loading of rates curves of different kinds for a given EOD
    StaticBACurves
    Class that creates a set of discount/credit curves from custom/user defined marks for a given EOD.
